Reviews.Content: london prices hardly space swing cat stayed april definitely seen days stairs lift bed ok wifi breakfast basic facilities clean quiet inner city convenient tube museums et al ken 5 days

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, functional but not a pleasure”
Reviews.Author: mariocatlin
Reviews.Content: chose hotel location relation liverpool street va southbank strand victoria coach station pretty perfectly located tube travel didnt expect luxury hotel disappointed low quality furniture worst bedsit five flights narrow stairs window looking wall reviewers staff pleasant helpful fridge microwave handy shower actually tiling etc breakfast 25 mins late adequate ok bed night aware basic hotel grand house imagine
